response.overview: When beautiful Carla Purty joins the university faculty, genetic professor Dr. Sherman Klump grows desperate to whittle his 400-pound frame down to size and win her heart. So, with one swig of his experimental fat-reducing serum, Sherman becomes 'Buddy Love', a fast-talking, pumped-up, plumped down Don Juan.
response.tagline: Inside Sherman Klump, a party animal is about to break out.
response.title: The Nutty Professor

cast.name: Eddie Murphy
cast.character: Sherman Klump / Buddy Love / Lance Perkins / Papa Klump / Mama Klump / Grandma Klump / Ernie Klump

cast.name: Arthur Tovey
cast.character: Elderly Man in Alumni Receiving Line (uncredited)

results.name: The Nutty Professor Wins Makeup: 1997 Oscars
